title: Denise Van Outen dazzles in a glitzy black semi-sheer gown
text:
She has been dating her fiancé Eddie Boxshall since 2014.

And Denise Van Outen and her beau appeared united as ever as they made a glam arrival at The Global Gift Gala at Kimpton Fitzroy hotel in London on Thursday.

The TV personality, 45, looked sensational in a deeply plunging black gown which was adorned with glitzy black sparkles in a leafy pattern.

Strike a pose! Denise Van Outen and her beau appeared united as ever as they made a glam arrival at The Global Gift Gala at Kimpton Fitzroy hotel in London on Thursday

Denise oozed sex appeal as she flashed some flesh in the semi-sheer gown, which featured halterneck spaghetti straps and a slight train.

The actress added to her glamorous look by styling her blonde tresses in boucy waves, leaving some strands to frame her pretty features.

She opted for a subtle black smokey-eye and a slick of pink lip gloss, while accessorising with a pair of black statement earrings.

Glam: Meanwhile, her fiancé Eddie rocked a sharp tuxedo with a black bow tie and a crisp white shirt with pair of thickly-rimmed glasses

Glitzy: The TV personality, 45, looked sensational in a deeply plunging black gown which was adorned with glitzy black sparkles in a leafy pattern

Stunner! Denise oozed sex appeal as she flashed some flesh in the semi-sheer gown, which featured halterneck spaghetti straps and a slight train

Meanwhile, her fiancé Eddie rocked a sharp tuxedo with a black bow tie and a crisp white shirt with pair of thickly-rimmed glasses.

The Global Gift Gala aims to raise funds to support and raise awareness for children and families worldwide on the verge of social exclusion, in situations of urgent need and on the poverty line.

The Global Gift Gala honours people who have helped the world through their philanthropic endeavours with The Global Gift Humanitarian Award.

Blonde beauty! The actress added to her glamorous look by styling her blonde tresses in boucy waves, leaving some strands to frame her pretty features

Smouldering: She opted for a subtle black smokey-eye and a slick of pink lip gloss, while accessorising with a pair of black statement earrings

Charity: The Global Gift Gala aims to raise funds to support and raise awareness for children and families worldwide on the verge of social exclusion, in situations of urgent need and on the poverty line

Denise has been setting up home with her partner after confirming in January they had finally moved in together.

The star told Hello! Magazine they were in no rush to live together, but are now enjoying the exciting milestone in their relationship after buying their first home as a couple last year.

Denise told the publication: 'Living together feels just right for us now. Some people might think: "They've taken their time", but we never felt the need to rush. We're both parents and in our mid-40s. We wanted our relationship to progress naturally.

Honours: The Global Gift Gala honours people who have helped the world through their philanthropic endeavours with The Global Gift Humanitarian Award

Loved-up: Denise has been setting up home with her partner after confirming in January they had finally moved in together

'This is our first place together. Finding it, doing it up and settling in as a family has been so exciting. We couldn't be happier.'

Denise, who turns 45 in later this month, also opened up on the prospect of having children with Eddie, admitting: 'It's a bit harder to get pregnant when you're older. Besides, having a puppy is a bit like having a new baby in the house.'

It came after Denise decided to move from Kent to London last year, in order for her daughter Betsy to attend a specialist school that caters to those with dyslexia.

The former Big Breakfast star shares Betsy with ex-husband Lee Mead. They tied the knot back in 2009 but split four years later in 2013, with their divorce later finalised in 2015.

Next step: The star told Hello! Magazine they were in no rush to live together, but are now enjoying the exciting milestone in their relationship after buying their first home as a couple last year
description: The TV personality, 45, looked sensational in a deeply plunging black gown which was adorned with glitzy black sparkles in a leafy pattern.
